name: Q-HOP
description:
Made in QOyun'2020, a quantum game jam organized by QTurkey, theme is "chaos", awarded second place

Each platform other than the red platforms represent a quantum logic gate. When the player steps onto one, it is applied to the next qubits. Red platforms are quantum platforms, one row of them represents two qubits. Each gate operation can change the probability of where the platform is. When the player steps onto the quantum row, an observation is made and superposition of qubits collapse to a single platform.
